TopicTitle: Camera is often sideways when launching a plane

Articles.Content: About half the time I launch a plane the camera controls are rotated 90 degrees ( it rotates as though a horizontal axis is the vertical axis) , and it's impossible to get the camera behind the plane with the sky at the top of the screen. Seems to happen about every other time, even with the same plane, and with multiple different planes using different cockpits. Specs: Windows 10, RTX 2060 super, Ryzen 7-3700X, Game version 0.1.0.0.20892

This is because the camera is being set to "Auto:Orbital".

Press the V key to change the camera as a work around.
